bannerMessage: By clicking “Accept All”, you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. Cookie Notice, Privacy Notice.

categories.label: Necessary
categories.description: Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.

categories.label: Preferences
categories.description: Preference cookies enable a website to remember information that changes the way the website behaves or looks, like your preferred language or the region that you are in.

categories.label: Statistics
categories.description: Statistic cookies help website owners to understand how visitors interact with websites by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

categories.label: Marketing
categories.description: Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers.

ccpa.firstLayerDescription: We and our partners are using technologies like cookies and process personal data in order to improve your experience. In case of sale of your personal information you may exercise your consumer right to opt-out by activating the toggle 'Do Not Sell My Personal Information' below. For detailed information about the categories of personal information we collect and the purposes for which information may be used and which Data Processing Services may have access to this information please click on 'More Information' or refer to our privacy policy.
ccpa.appFirstLayerDescription: We and our partners are using tracking technologies to process personal data in order to improve your experience. You may always exercise your consumer right to opt-out. For detailed information about personal information we collect and third parties having access to it, please select 'More Information' or refer to our privacy policy.
ccpa.firstLayerMobileDescription: We and our partners are using technologies like cookies and process personal data in order to improve your experience. In case of sale of your personal information you may exercise your consumer right to opt-out by activating the toggle 'Do Not Sell My Personal Information' below.
ccpa.secondLayerDescription: Here you can find detailed information about the categories of personal information we collect and the purposes for which information may be used and which Data Processing Services may have access to this information.
ccpa.optOutNoticeLabel: Do not sell my personal information

tcf2.firstLayerDescription: We and our third-party vendors use technologies (e.g. cookies) to store and/or access information on user's devices in order to process personal data such as IP addresses or browsing data. You may consent to the processing of your personal data for the listed purposes below. Alternatively you can set your preferences before consenting or refuse to consent. Please note that some vendors may process your personal data based on their legitimate business interest and do not ask for your consent. To exercise your right to object to processing based on legitimate interest please view our vendorlist.
tcf2.secondLayerDescription: You can access more detailed information below regarding all purposes and third-party vendors. You can adjust your privacy settings based on specific purposes and/or at a vendor level at any time.
tcf2.labelsIabVendors: Vendors who are part of the IAB TCF
tcf2.labelsDisclaimer: All choices on this website will be applied globally, which means they will be available on other websites that set your choices globally. By clicking on our Privacy Button in the bottom left corner, you can change your settings or withdraw your consent at any time.
tcf2.appLayerNoteResurface: You can change your privacy settings or withdraw your consent at any time by opening the menu point Privacy Settings.
tcf2.firstLayerNoteGlobal: Your choices for this website will be applied globally, which means they will be available to other websites that set your choices globally.
tcf2.firstLayerNoteResurface: You can change your privacy settings or withdraw your consent at any time by clicking on our Privacy Button.
tcf2.firstLayerNoteService: Your choices for this website will be applied on this page only. You can change your Privacy Settings or withdraw your consent at any time by clicking on our Privacy Button.
tcf2.labelsNonIabVendors: Vendors who are not part of the IAB TCF
tcf2.dataSharedOutsideEUText: Some vendors might transfer data to countries outside the EU / EEA (third country data transfer), such as the USA, as part of the processing for the mentioned purposes. The level of data protection in these countries might not be comparable to the data protection regime in EU / EEA countries; there is therefore a particular risk that government authorities could access this data. For more information on security guarantees, see the vendors privacy policy or contact the vendor directly.
tcf2.atpAdditionalInfo: Click here to read the privacy policy of the data processor

atpPurposes.p1: Use cookies or other local storage when legally required
atpPurposes.p2: Collect, share, and use of personal data for personalization of ads

labels.titleCorner:
When you visit any web site, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience.

Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. In some cases, data obtained from cookies is shared with third parties You can exercise your right to opt-out of that sharing at any time by disabling cookies.

However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.

More Information
labels.poweredBy: Powered by Usercentrics Consent Management.
labels.dataProtectionOfficer: Data Protection Officer of Processing Company
labels.optOut: Click here to opt out from this processor across all domains
labels.policyOf: Click here to read the privacy policy of the data processor
labels.dataCollectedInfo: This list represents all (personal) data that is collected by or through the use of this service.
labels.legalBasisInfo: In the following the required legal basis for the processing of data is listed.
labels.locationofProcessingInfo: This is the primary location where the collected data is being processed. If the data is also processed in other countries, you are informed separately.
labels.retentionPeriodInfo: The retention period is the time span the collected data is saved for the processing purposes. The data needs to be deleted as soon as it is no longer needed for the stated processing purposes.
labels.dataRecipientsListInfo: In the following the recipients of the data collected are listed.
labels.transferToThirdCountriesInfo: This service may forward the collected data to a different country. Please note that this service might transfer the data to a country without the required data protection standards. Below you can find a list of countries to which the data is being transferred. For more information regarding safeguards please refer to the provider's privacy policy or contact the provider directly.
labels.dataProtectionOfficerInfo: Below you can find the email address of the data protection officer of the processing company.
labels.dataPurposesInfo: This list represents the purposes of the data collection and processing.
labels.technologiesUsedInfo: This list represents all technologies this service uses to collect data.
labels.consentDescription: Description of the use of the data
labels.technology: Technology being used to process the data
labels.legalGrounds: Legal ground according to Art. 6 GDPR on which data processing is based
labels.headerModal: This tool helps you manage consent to third party technologies collecting and processing personal data.
labels.cookiePolicyInfo: Click here to read the cookie policy of the data processor
labels.iabCategoryNonIabDescription: Vendors not yet registered with IAB Framework.
labels.iabExamplePersonalData: Example for personal data: IP address
labels.name: Name
labels.informationLoadingNotPossible: Sorry, we could not load the required information.
labels.storageInformationDescription: Below you can see the longest potential duration for storage on a device, as set when using any method of storage.
labels.storedInformationDescription: This service uses different means of storing information on a user’s device as listed below.
